评论详情: Love this hoodie. The pink color is really bright and the hoodie is nice and soft. It’s not a super heavy one. I could wear it on a fall day but I could also wear it under a winter coat and not be too hot. Thee are no strings for the hood which I prefer as my kitten likes to attack them like they’re her mortal enemy. Size seems to be accurate but I ordered a size up because I like my hoodies roomy.

these hoodies are very comfortable but the material is cheap reminds me of shein quality. the sizing is also way off. I am usually a small in tops but ordered a medium for a oversized fit and it fits like a xxl , it reaches my knees and sleeves are extremely long .

I got the smallest size and I know it’s supposed to be over sized but it felt like I was swimming in it. I’m about 5 feet tall. I do like the color I got though and the inside is very soft. It is truly oversized though. But also when I touch it it just feels cheap. It feels a little tacky to touch.

They're big, comfy, and cozy. Ever since I bought my first one, I was wearing it everyday. I've bought my second one just recently, and will probably be getting more. I love these sweaters! I bought a large (I'm 5'2", weighing about 140). A medium would probably do, but I just love the big baggy fit.Only thing I'd consider a downside is these should be washed in cold water, and since it doesn't mention instructions for drying I'd hang-dry these in case of shrinkage.Have I mentioned how in love I am with these sweaters?

The material was a more of a medium/heavy weight, which i wanted. The wine color was true to color.  I usually wear a size small, occasionally a medium.  I got the small and it was huge on me. I realize it's described as "oversized " but this was more like an Xl. I loved everything about it except the size.  Unfortunately it was returned.
The fabric is nice and soft..the stitching seems very good.This looks and feels like my older cotton hoodies. Buying another now!
This hoodie is perfect for fall or breezy beach days. I love it so much. It's the perfect size and fit. Perfect to take to the beach.

评论概述: Compliments every time I wear them!
评论详情: This product is so spongy and comfy. It is very thick but also made it a breathable material. I really like the color and the product itself. I recommend if you looking for a more affordable nice hoodie.
Very soft and cozy! Might purchase again! I might buy again in a medium.

Excellent quality! Nice, thick, soft material with oversized feel. If you want it to cover your butt, I’d recommend sizing up one. I’m ordered an XL and happy that I did. I’ll definitely be ordering more colors wise the price is great for the quality.

This is the perfect, over-sized sweatshirt! The quality is amazing and worth more than the price. Not too thick & not too thin. Plenty of room & plenty of comfort. It is wonderfully soft. I am 5'2", 112 lbs., 34B, 27" waist, 35" hips. I bought the size medium. The sweatshirt is very roomy. The sleeves are a little longer than my arms which I love. The length hits my upper thigh area. I will continue to buy mediums for myself because I love the fit but a small could have sufficed. I would have had a little less room, but I still would have been very comfortable with the roominess of the small. I would not hesitate to purchase this as a gift for someone. The delivery was on time.
